module.name: class_of_activity
module.keywords: module, class, activity, action, process, process plant

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module to record the existence of a class of activity.
An individual activity is what happens, perhaps merely continued existence without change, to an individual physical object during a period of time.
Membership of a class of activity may indicate the nature of an individual activity.

li.p: the existence of a class of activity.

li.note: Individual activity is within the scope of the Individual_activity application module.

li.p: membership of a class of activity;
li.note: Membership of a class of activity is within the scope of the Activity_structure_and_classification application module.
Relationships between classes of activity are within the scopes of the Class_of_composition_of_activity and Class_of_connection_of_activity application modules.

li.p: class_of_involvement of things in an activity.
li.note: Class of involvement is within the scope of the Class_of_involvement_in_activity application module.

uof.name: Class_of_activity
uof.description: The Class_of_activity UoF identifies a class of activity, action or process.
